reviews.review: I started playing this game in 2017 and this game is one of the games i play daily .. #tryhard

good game toxic community but fun
good comunity fun game. hard. skill curve but fun

I love both playing it and watch pro games playing CS GO during tournaments. One of the best games ever,
CSGO has been a great introduction to PC gaming as a whole but can be difficult to get the grasp of. That being said, anyone who owns a gaming PC should totally buy CSGO.
Mucho xit , gente toxica , y peruan...
Игра в которую не хочешь играть, но играешь

It's a good game. I have a love-hate relationship with it, mainly because I'm bad, but I keep coming back.  Am I in an abusive relationship with CS:GO? Maybe...

Edit: finally made it nova hell. i want to cry every time i play this game but i keep coming back
Графон - говно, тиммейты - токсичные, фпс - низкий, баги - куча. Топ за свои деньги.
csgo pire jeux au monde ne jamais y jouer <3
Great game, less hackers would make it amazing

bought it right before the f2p update. 

11/10 would do it again

OK TIME FOR AN UPDATE:

DONT REGRET GETTING PRIME BEFORE F2P UPDATE WOOOOOO smartest investment to get it at half price like 10bucks during a summer sale.

solo q'd for around 400 hours but never once got a hacker.
queue'd with a friend who was non-prime and instantly hackers on both teams.

gameplay experience speaks louder than words eh?

followed this game for around 5 years 
Graphics 5/5
friends 5/5
visuals 5/5
Game 5/5
前一百个小时拿来练枪和看别人做的丢道具视频加点和思路可以帮你快速入门，另外这个游戏因为有完整的游戏录像能力，再加上游戏本身的一些玩法上的设定，人们总能创造出非常精彩或者搞笑的片段组成集锦，这已经是每天娱乐的一部分了哈哈哈哈哈哈哈
This game taught me how to do my taxes
Pre-fire everywhere and get ez kills, EZ SILVER FOR LIFE
Very Epic Game. just tap on heads. EZ

Данная игра вызовет у вас любовь к чужим матерям, желание говорить на разных языках, а так же агрессивное поведение. Сложится ощущение, что за вас четверо очень уравновешенных и добрых мобов, но вскоре поймете, что в команде их 5 . В общем не игра, а просто сказка :3
De los mejores juegos, marco mi infancia y ahora mi vida

Toxic community? Check, Difficult game mechanics, Sorta. is there any game i love more? nope. This game will make you mad it will make you glad but first and foremost it will make you wanna keep playing.
community servers are epic as hell and the main thing that makes this game good
游戏没怎么玩 皮肤开箱倒是花了不少了
Game is toxic, very many cheaters, but is fun to play with friends.
very bad game and doesn't work half the time and too many cheaters. but i still play since i spent too much time and money on it so yay.
I like it, i get gold 2 my main rank / Supreme
